'''Raw''' may refer to:

== Food ==
[[File:Mobs food scale.png|thumb|All the [[mob]]s that drop raw meat with their respective food (with the exception of the [[mooshroom]].)]]

* {{ItemLink|Raw Cod}}, an item dropped by {{EntityLink|cod}}.
* {{ItemLink|Raw Salmon}}, an item dropped by {{EntityLink|salmon}}.
* {{ItemLink|Raw Chicken}}, an item dropped by {{EntityLink|chicken|chickens}}.
* {{ItemLink|Raw Beef}}, an item dropped by {{EntityLink|cow|cows}} and {{EntityLink|Mooshroom|mooshrooms}}.
* {{ItemLink|Raw Porkchop}}, an item dropped by {{EntityLink|pig|pigs}} and {{EntityLink|hoglin|hoglins}}.
* {{ItemLink|Raw Mutton}}, an item dropped by {{EntityLink|sheep}}.
* {{ItemLink|Raw Rabbit}}, an item dropped by {{EntityLink|rabbit|rabbits}}.
* {{ItemLink|Kelp}}, an underwater plant that can be considered the raw variant of {{ItemLink|Dried Kelp}}.
* {{ItemLink|Potato}}, a plant that can be considered the raw variant of {{ItemLink|Baked Potato}}.

* {{ItemLink|Raw Iron}}
* {{ItemLink|Raw Gold}}

* {{BlockLink|Block of Raw Gold}}
* {{BlockLink|Block of Raw Copper}}
